item.description:
• Version 1.5.0 (21):
    • New: The app no longer comes with the default reference database, which will be downloaded from the server as needed. This reduces the app's size.
    • The app is compatible with MacOS Tahoe.
  • Version 1.4.0 (20):
    • New: The new Composition Speed Dependency tool, accessible from the Products menu, can be used to visualize the speed dependency of the spectrum composition.
  • Version 1.3.0 (19):
    • New: You can edit spectrum properties using the new editor in the spectra navigation menu.
    • New: The new Line Area Speed Dependency tool, accessible from the Products menu, can be used to visualize the speed dependency of line ratios.
    • Bug fixes and improvements.
  • Version 1.2.1 (18):
    • Projects can now have more than one spectrum.
  • Version 1.1.1 (16):
    • App is now sharing its internal reference database with the PacketAnalyzer app and the Spectrum App.
    • Added cluster lines filter.
    • Added dynamic range setup.
    • Improved instrument mapping.
    • Improved stability and performance.
  • Version 1.0.9 (9):
    • Improved the performance for spectra with hundreds of lines.
    • Fixed an issue that prevented the updater from working properly.
  • Version 1.0.8 (8):
    • Fixed an issue that led to a crash after adding the first line.
  • Version 1.0.7 (7):
    • Fixed an issue that prevented the app from launching.
  • Version 1.0.6 (6):
    • First release.

• Version 1.3.0 (19):
    • Spectrum properties can be edited using a new editor in the spectra navigation menu.
    • The speed dependency of line ratios can be visualized with the new Speed Dependency tool, accessible from the Products menu.
    • Bug fixes and improvements.
  • Version 1.2.1 (18):
    • Projects can now have more than one spectrum.
  • Version 1.1.1 (16):
    • App is now sharing its internal reference database with the PacketAnalyzer app and the Spectrum App.
    • Added cluster lines filter
    • Added dynamic range setup
    • Improved instrument mapping.
    • Improved stability and performance.
  • Version 1.0.9 (9):
    • Improved the performance for spectra with hundreds of lines.
    • Fixed an issue that prevented the updater to work properly
  • Version 1.0.8 (8):
    • FIxed an issue that lead to a crash after adding the first line.
  • Version 1.0.7 (7):
    • FIxed an issue that prevented the app from launching.
  • Version 1.0.6 (6):
    • First release
